content: **finished size ** approximately 10 5 cm 4 inches **yarn ** i use 100% acrylic yarn - schachenmayr bravo to be precise you can use whatever colors and yarn work for you **crochet hook ** 3 mm **you will also need ** * pins * scissors * tapestry needle or needle and thread * 10 mm or 12 mm safety eyes or needle and black thread if you wish to embroider the eyes * toy stuffing ***pattern includes instructions on how to make pride whales***
